name: Funny Hexa Box Color
description:
Funny Hexa Box Color is a hexa block puzzle game. It`s simple yet addictive gameplay that challenges your brain & helps You to develop logic, concentration, awareness, and at the same time do it slowly and thoughtfully
Game RULES

• Drag the hexa puzzle blocks to move them.
• Aim to fit them all into the frame.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Touch hexa puzzle blocks to remove them from the field.
